title: Continually Disconnecting from Games
body: Playing on an alt account, I quit the game, early enough to remake, because my video settings were all screwed up, and I couldn't see half the screen. I then tried to que up a custom bot game, to fix my settings, only to disconnect immediately, and then be unable to reconnect, as each time I tried to reconnect, it disconnected me again. I was currently on the legacy client, so I tried updating to the BETA client, to see if it would help. Unfortunetly, the problem persisted, and I can't get into any games period. I then deleted and reinstalled League, thinking I may have damaged the files in some way, and signed on to my main account, this one. I entered through the legacy client, started up a bot game, locked in Karthus, and ten seconds later disconnected. When I tried to reconnect, it disconnected me again, and gave me the bugsplat thing to fill out. What should I do?

replies.body: The bugsplat error strongly indicates that this is not a connection problem, but something going wrong with your pc like drivers or game files.  Go through the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to fix this up and get back in game.  Test it out in custom games until you're sure!  Let me know if you have any questions!
